name: Dragua
description:
Rise, young Dragua. You are born to protect this realm. Kulshedra’s tendrils advance upon the world’s flame, seeking to extinguish all existence. You must keep the flame strong while We prepare the world for rebirth. The flame will die if you do not tend to it.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam in under 72 hours!
